body:
@poxvoculi That will raise error:
```python
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "issue.py", line 30, in <module>
    decode_state = tf.cond(decode_mode, lambda:enc_holder, encoder())
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/control_flow_ops.py", line 1694, in cond
    raise TypeError("fn2 must be callable.")
TypeError: fn2 must be callable.
```
